regen.absent_element: detailed 'necessary information' within the functional identity
regen.new_specification: The system shall include additional identifying data such as driver ID if both train and engine numbers are unavailable.

regen.absent_element: missing protocol when neither train nor engine number is available in the functional identity
regen.new_specification: If neither the train number nor the engine number is available, the system shall display 'Unknown Identity' as the functional identity to the controller.

regen.absent_element: confirmation of functional identity reception by controller
regen.new_specification: The system shall verify and confirm that the functional identity has been received by the controller after it is sent.

label: If the system is not able to connect the call, an audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver that the call was not received by the controller.
